Yung-chang Hardware Store
Such commodities belonging to the category of "General Equipmont & Commodities" should be auctioned to light industrial end-users. The purposes of the above mentioned recipients are apparently for resale which is prohibited by the "Special Provisions". It was also disclosed that a few of such items were sold to the individual persons who are not eligible to bid. CUSA explained that the auction of these commodities followed the practice previous- ly employed in auctioning commodities procured under PA 0219 in which no provision stipulating the method of disposal was available. However, PA provisions onco set forth should be stictly adhered to or the prior concurrence of the US AID/C should be obtained.

paragraphs.content: Attachment I Audit Report No. A-1711

Such commodities belonging to the category of "General Equipmont & Commodities" should be auctioned to light industrial end-users. The purposes of the above mentioned recipients are apparently for resale which is prohibited by the "Special Provisions". It was also disclosed that a few of such items were sold to the individual persons who are not eligible to bid. CUSA explained that the auction of these commodities followed the practice previous- ly employed in auctioning commodities procured under PA 0219 in which no provision stipulating the method of disposal was available. However, PA provisions onco set forth should be stictly adhered to or the prior concurrence of the US AID/C should be obtained.
